category_count.description: The number of categories in the glossary.

create_time.description: The time at which the glossary was created.

description.description: The user-mutable description of the glossary.

display_name.description: User friendly display name of the glossary. This is user-mutable. This will be same as the glossaryId, if not specified.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

labels.description: User-defined labels for the Glossary. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: The location where the glossary should reside.

name.description: The resource name of the Glossary. Format: projects/{projectId}/locations/{locationId}/glossaries/{glossaryId}

term_count.description: The number of terms in the glossary.

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

uid.description: System generated unique id for the Glossary. This ID will be different if the Glossary is deleted and re-created with the same name.

update_time.description: The time at which the glossary was last updated.
